channel.title: Contravariance
channel.description: An experimental podcast about Apple, Swift and other programming topics. By Benedikt Terhechte and Bas Broek.

item.itunes:title: applicationDidFinishLaunching:
item.description: We discuss keyboards, 8 years of Swift and conferences we'll be speaking at in September 2018.
